title: Rule of Shadows
description: Six names. Six responsible for her fate.Even if Ana had every name, her path would be difficult. The guilty are powerful, protected, and dangerous. But Ana only has three of the names she needs. In order to claim the rest, she must grant Lady Jacobs three favors.In doing so, Ana will descend deeper into the dark, glittering world of the Royal City and further away from the protective walls of the Academy. Who will win this game of shadows and crowns?★♥★RULE OF SHADOWS is the third book in the Shadows & Starlight series. If you loved the royal court intrigue of Cruel Prince and the sci-fi, interstellar twist of Cinder, this series is for you!Book 1: Seven CrownsBook 2: The Botanist's GameBook 3: Rule of ShadowsBook 4: Fallen Kingdom
author: E.V. Everest
